abstract.text: Catalog sloths you find in nature and create new adorable virtual sloths.

inlineContent.text: SlothCreator provides models and utilities for creating, tracking, and caring for sloths. The framework provides structures to model an individual, and identify them by key characteristics, including their.

A protocol that defines types capable of generating random values.
Usage
A high-level interface for generating and caching random values.
A random number generator that produces consistent results based on a seed value.
A cache system for storing and retrieving randomly generated values.
